api_list.name: Get All War Updates
api_list.description: This will return all news about the Ukraine War
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ukraine-war-update.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ukraine-war-update.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get specific News Source
api_list.description:
Gets a specific News Source:
- bbc
- reuters
- ap
- foreignaffairs
- defenceblog
- voanews
-nytimes
-aljazeera
-dw
-france24
-kyivindependent
-theguardian
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ukraine-war-update.p.rapidapi.com/news/theguardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ukraine-war-update.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ukraine-war-update.p.rapidapi.com/news/{srcid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ukraine-war-update.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
